headword_en: Office of the Chief Information Officer
definition_en: An executive-level office responsible for the management, strategy, and execution of information technology and resources within an organization.
definition_ko: 조직 내 정보 기술(IT) 및 자원의 관리, 전략 및 실행을 담당하는 집행 수준의 부서.

slots.context_ko: Office of the Chief Information Officer Reproduction and Distribution Services Section
